confirm.removeChat: Are you sure you want to remove this chat?

chatStart.title: Choose a mask
chatStart.subtitle: Chat with the soul behind the mask

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: All settings as per your preference

language.title: Language
language.subtitle: The language used for the interface.

sendKey.title: Send Key
sendKey.subtitle1: Press Enter to send, hold Shift + Enter to go to the next line.
sendKey.subtitle2: Press Ctrl (or Command) + Enter to send.

sendPreviewBubble.title: Send Preview Bubble
sendPreviewBubble.subtitle: Allow previewing the message that will be sent while composing.

accessCode.title: Access Code
accessCode.subtitle: The access code is authorized to access OpenAI.

messageCompressionThreshold.title: Compression Threshold
messageCompressionThreshold.subtitle: When this threshold is reached, the conversation content will be summarized to reduce token consumption.

confirm.reset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default?
confirm.deleteAll: Are you sure you want to delete all conversations and settings?

chatWindow.emptyChat: How can I assist you today?

editTitle.title: Rename Conversation
editTitle.subtitle: Give this conversation a new name.

webReader.title: Web Reader
webReader.subtitle: Read the content of a website.

pdfReader.title: PDF Reader
pdfReader.subtitle: Read the content of a PDF file from one or more public URLs.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize the settings for this chat.

maxTokens.title: Max Tokens
maxTokens.tooltip: The maximum number of tokens to return.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.tooltip: Controls the randomness of the returned text; lower is less random.

topP.title: Top P
topP.tooltip: The cumulative probability of the most likely tokens to return.

frequencyPenalty.title: Frequency Penalty
frequencyPenalty.tooltip: How much to penalize tokens based on their frequency in the text so far.

presencePenalty.title: Presence Penalty
presencePenalty.tooltip: How much to penalize tokens based on if they have appeared in the text so far.

confirm.clearHistory: Are you sure you want to clear the chat history?
confirm.removeFile: Are you sure you want to remove this file?
